content: Where can I find the dataverse CSP Configuration? I am going to - for testing purposes - modify the value of frame-ancestors.
Hmm, CSP might be hard-coded. Please see this: Prevent non-widgets from being embedded in iframes #8662
I just set up an instance of nginx as reverse proxy over dataverse and overridden CSP headers - for testing purposes.
Mohsen Jafari has marked this topic as resolved.
